title: Client crash during champ select in ranked

replies.body:
Hey there,

I would first recommend [repairing your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) to rule that out as the cause.

It's also possible this may be related to a connection issue, could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues KB article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if the above repair doesn't resolve your issue. Let me know if anything helps.

I read a post somewhere the only way to fix this is by fully reinstalling LoL. It came about on patch 6.15 and no hotfix was ever released.

I have the same issue, but I put up with the 5 minute CD.

Could you provide a source for this?

Most issues that occur in champ select are caused by connection problems.

I have a solid connection and a short chat with my ISP tells me there is no connection issue. Im using cable.
